newsitem.title: UK: Vodaphone plans tests to find world phone.
newsitem.headline: Vodaphone plans tests to find world phone.

text.p: British mobile telecommunications firm Vodaphone Group and Qualcomm of the United States are collaborating in trials to produce a world phone capable of performing in the U.S., Europe and Asia.
The Financial Times newspaper said on Friday that the trials will take place in Britain later this year. They will test a mobile network combining Europe's GSM standard and its U.S. competitor CDMA.
The newspaper said a possible consequence of the trial would be that CDMA could prove superior to GSM and lead to the eventual decline of GSM as a potential standard for digital mobile phone.
